Package uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Components.DescribableDescriptionUpdater

Class DescribableDescriptionUpdater<T extends IDescribable>

java.lang.Object
uk.mddeveloper.SchemaShovelWebAPI.Components.DescribableDescriptionUpdater.DescribableDescriptionUpdater<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type for the instance (must implement IDescribable)
@Component
public class DescribableDescriptionUpdater<T extends IDescribable>
extends java.lang.Object
This is used to update the descriptions of any models that implement IDescribable
Author:
Matthew Derbyshire

  • Method Details

    • updateDescriptionWithGivenRepo

      public DescriptionOnlyHelperModel updateDescriptionWithGivenRepo​(DescriptionOnlyHelperModel newDescription, java.lang.Long id, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,​java.lang.Long> repo) throws UnprocessableEntityException, InternalServerErrorException
      Using the given repository, update the description of an object that implements IDescribable
      Parameters:
      newDescription - A DescriptionOnlyHelperModel instance, with the new description for the entity
      id - The PK of the entity
      repo - The repository to use to perform this operation
      Returns:
      A DescriptionOnlyHelperModel instance, with the new description
      Throws:
      UnprocessableEntityException - Thrown if the provided description is null
      InternalServerErrorException - Thrown if there is any general error
